  • All Implemented Interfaces:

extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Controller in charge of handling a player's turn.

      void executeGameActionQueue()
      Executes the next game action in the game action queue with its own timer and suspends players who time out for the set amount of times.

      Returns size of the actionQueue, used for testing
      BoardController getBoardController() 
      int getEndGameReason()
      Getter for endGameReason if 0 then the number of players is below the minimun allowed if 1 then all the skulls were removed and FinalFrenzy wasn't selected if 2 then FinalFrenzy has ended

      Returns the index of the player who activated Final Frenzy.

      Refills a map with new weapons and powerUps to replace the taken ones.
      private void showEndGameReason(java.lang.String message)
      Shows a message on all clients explaining the reason why the game has ended.
